name: SteWizard
description:
The game is not finished, but it's still playable! :)

You're Stewie, the kitchen wizard. You were cooking your stew, when your wizard cousin, Clowny, decided to bring your vegetables to life! Now you have to use your cook-arsenal to hunt them, in order to finish cooking your delicious and (arguabily) cruelty-free stew! (yum)

This game was made for the 6 Mechanics Jam. It was a one-week jam, but we joined like 3 days before the deadline, so we did what we could in this last 3 days or so. Restriction was "Lose to Win", so we thought of "losing your equipment in order to progress on the game", and that's why you gotta throw one of your items at the end of each level lol

Thanks to sailorastronarts for the beautiful art! 

Also, I want to credit LuKremBo for the song I used for the game. You can listen to it here!

Hope you like it! :D
